LuminarasCurse.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Once per combat, at 75%, 50%, and 25% Health, the Ranger Blinds all enemies within a 20-radius for 2.5 seconds and reduces their Resistances and Attack Speed by 15%.

Description.Format: Allies within {Radius}-radius gain <DamageReduction>{DamageRed}%</><DamageReduction></> <DamageReduction>Damage Reduction</>.

CelestialInfusion.Name: CelestialInfusion
CelestialInfusion.DisplayDescription: Every 15th attack, grant <OmegaPowerPercentage>50</><OmegaPowerPercentage></> <OmegaPowerPercentage>Omega Power</> to allies within 20-radius.

Description.Format: Every {AttackNum}th attack, grant <OmegaPowerPercentage>{OPVal}</><OmegaPowerPercentage></> <OmegaPowerPercentage>Omega Power</> to allies within {Radius}-radius.

CelestialInfusion.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Every 15th attack, grant 50 Omega Power to allies within 20-radius.

EvasiveMomentum.Name: EvasiveMomentum
EvasiveMomentum.DisplayDescription: Every 4 seconds, gain <AttackDodgeChancePercentage>100%</><AttackDodgeChancePercentage></> <AttackDodgeChancePercentage>Dodge Chance</> for 1 second. After dodging an attack, the Ranger gains 40% <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</><AttackSpeed></> and <MoveSpeedSubUnits>Movement Speed</><MoveSpeedSubUnits></> for 2 seconds.

Description.Format: Every {Trigger} seconds, gain <AttackDodgeChancePercentage>{Dodge}%</><AttackDodgeChancePercentage></> <AttackDodgeChancePercentage>Dodge Chance</> for {Duration} second. After dodging an attack, the Ranger gains {ASVal}% <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</><AttackSpeed></> and <MoveSpeedSubUnits>Movement Speed</><MoveSpeedSubUnits></> for {Duration2} seconds.

EvasiveMomentum.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Every 4 seconds, gain 100% Dodge Chance for 1 second. After dodging an attack, the Ranger gains 40% Attack Speed and Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

LifeLeecher.Name: LifeLeecher
LifeLeecher.DisplayDescription: Once per combat, upon reaching 30% <MaxHealth>Health</>, the Ranger unleashes a life-draining surge, siphoning <MaxHealth>10%</><MaxHealth></> of <MaxHealth>Max Health</> from each of the 5 closest enemies over 5 seconds.

Description.Format: Once per combat, upon reaching {HealthTrigger}% <MaxHealth>Health</>, the Ranger unleashes a life-draining surge, siphoning <MaxHealth>{DrainAmount}%</><MaxHealth></> of <MaxHealth>Max Health</> from each of the {EnemyNum} closest enemies over {Duration} seconds.

LifeLeecher.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Once per combat, upon reaching 30% Health, the Ranger unleashes a life-draining surge, siphoning 10% of Max Health from each of the 5 closest enemies over 5 seconds.

StaggeringStrike.Name: StaggeringStrike
StaggeringStrike.DisplayDescription: The Ranger's <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> is reduced by <AttackSpeed>-75%</><AttackSpeed></>, but all attacks deal <MaxHealth>10%</><MaxHealth></> of the target's <MaxHealth>Max Health</> as Pure Damage and Stun them for 0.5 seconds.

Description.Format: The Ranger's <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> is reduced by <AttackSpeed>{ASDebuff}%</><AttackSpeed></>, but all attacks deal <MaxHealth>{Damage}%</><MaxHealth></> of the target's <MaxHealth>Max Health</> as Pure Damage and Stun them for {StunDuration} seconds.

StaggeringStrike.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: The Ranger's Attack Speed is reduced by -75%, but all attacks deal 10% of the target's Max Health as Pure Damage and Stun them for 0.5 seconds.

BeetlesParadox.Name: BeetlesParadox
BeetlesParadox.DisplayDescription: On Combat Start and every 10 seconds thereafter, the Ranger gains a Shield equal to 15% of <MaxHealth>Max Health</> and <DamageAmplification>10%</> <DamageAmplification>Damage Amp</>.

Description.Format: On Combat Start and every {Trigger} seconds thereafter, the Ranger gains a Shield equal to {ShieldVal}% of <MaxHealth>Max Health</> and <DamageAmplification>{DmgAmp}%</> <DamageAmplification>Damage Amp</>.

BeetlesParadox.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: On Combat Start and every 10 seconds thereafter, the Ranger gains a Shield equal to 15% of Max Health and 10% Damage Amp.

ExplosiveTempo.Name: ExplosiveTempo
ExplosiveTempo.DisplayDescription: Attacks grant <AttackSpeed>2%</><AttackSpeed></> stacking <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</>. Every 5th attack explodes within a 20-radius, dealing <AttackSpeed>250%</><AttackSpeed></> of your <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> as <AttackPhysicalDamage>Physical Damage</>.

Description.Format: Attacks grant <AttackSpeed>{ASVal}%</><AttackSpeed></> stacking <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</>. Every {AttackNum}th attack explodes within a {Radius}-radius, dealing <AttackSpeed>{DamageVal}%</><AttackSpeed></> of your <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> as <AttackPhysicalDamage>Physical Damage</>.

ExplosiveTempo.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Attacks grant 2% stacking Attack Speed. Every 5th attack explodes within a 20-radius, dealing 250% of your Attack Speed as Physical Damage.

HealingTether.Name: HealingTether
HealingTether.DisplayDescription: Every 3 seconds, the Ranger and the 2 lowest Health allies heal for <MaxHealth>3%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</>.

Description.Format: Every {TriggerTime} seconds, the Ranger and the {AllyNum} lowest Health allies heal for <MaxHealth>{HealVal}%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</>.

HealingTether.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Every 3 seconds, the Ranger and the 2 lowest Health allies heal for 3% of their Max Health.

Jumpsuit.Name: Jumpsuit

Jumpsuit.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: The Jumpsuit can be enhanced during the Suit Amplifier Round.

CrashingBastion.Name: CrashingBastion
CrashingBastion.DisplayDescription: On Combat Start, the Ranger and the 3 closest allies gain a Shield equal to <MaxHealth>10%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</> for 5 seconds. When the Shields expire, they explode, dealing damage equal to the initial Shield amount.

Description.Format: On Combat Start, the Ranger and the {AllyNum} closest allies gain a Shield equal to <MaxHealth>{ShieldVal}%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</> for {ShieldDuration} seconds. When the Shields expire, they explode, dealing damage equal to the initial Shield amount.

CrashingBastion.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: On Combat Start, the Ranger and the 3 closest allies gain a Shield equal to 10% of their Max Health for 5 seconds. When the Shields expire, they explode, dealing damage equal to the initial Shield amount.

DimensionalAmbush.Name: DimensionalAmbush
DimensionalAmbush.DisplayDescription: On Combat Start, the Ranger blinks to the opposite side of the board, becomes Untargetable, and gains <AttackSpeed>100%</><AttackSpeed></> <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> for 6 seconds. After 6 seconds, blink back and gain <AttackDamage>50%</><AttackDamage></> <AttackDamage>Attack Damage</>.

Description.Format: On Combat Start, the Ranger blinks to the opposite side of the board, becomes Untargetable, and gains <AttackSpeed>{AttackSpeedVal}%</><AttackSpeed></> <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> for {Duration} seconds. After {RetriggerBlink} seconds, blink back and gain <AttackDamage>{ADVal}%</><AttackDamage></> <AttackDamage>Attack Damage</>.

DimensionalAmbush.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: On Combat Start, the Ranger blinks to the opposite side of the board, becomes Untargetable, and gains 100% Attack Speed for 6 seconds. After 6 seconds, blink back and gain 50% Attack Damage.

TemporalFlare.Name: TemporalFlare
TemporalFlare.DisplayDescription: Every 3rd Omega, grant <AttackSpeed>50%</><AttackSpeed></> <AttackSpeed>Attack Speed</> to allies within 20-radius for 5 seconds.

TemporalFlare.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: Every 3rd Omega, grant 50% Attack Speed to allies within 20-radius for 5 seconds.

Skills.Name: Impervium - Blink to ally and Heal

ActivationTrigger.DisplayDescription: When dropping below 40% <MaxHealth>Health</>, blink to the lowest health ally. Both the Ranger and that ally heal for <MaxHealth>40%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</>.

Description.Format: When dropping below {Trigger}% <MaxHealth>Health</>, blink to the lowest health ally. Both the Ranger and that ally heal for <MaxHealth>{Heal}%</><MaxHealth></> of their <MaxHealth>Max Health</>.

ActivationTrigger.DisplayDescriptionNormalized: When dropping below 40% Health, blink to the lowest health ally. Both the Ranger and that ally heal for 40% of their Max Health.
